amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to fund the Bronx Council on the Arts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used for the Bronx Council on the Arts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 74 - 343 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
